channel.title: Helmet Model
channel.description:
OK So heres another half completed untextured model Im working on. Its a helm. Im working on Texturing it atm. Im thinking either another barrows bro or some form of barbaric helm. Anyway what do you think from the toon renders? Ill get more renders after I texture them and color them and all. Anywa I want some early feedback of what you think so far. Also do you think this can be entered in the Helm Model contest?
Pics: [IMG]http://i1011.photobucket.com/albums/af235/Mr_Biosoft/helmentryearlyrender.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1011.photobucket.com/albums/af235/Mr_Biosoft/helmentryearlyrender2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Helmet Model
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

The MatPane in your system tab. Click on it, Then click “New” And double click “mat1” Then you can choose a colour there. Then look for mat in the command ->face tab click it, then apply your colour.

Read full topic

item.title: Helmet Model
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

I forgot about that rule lol, Well I can always do another. Is there a different way to color in meta besides using faces? or is faces the only way? Anyway for the basic concept thus far how does it look?

Read full topic

item.title: Helmet Model
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

“This” Cannot be entered Due to a rule that you cannot release a model entree during a contest. Also, Try colouring your models and add more detail.

Read full topic
